title: Practice Like a Pro: The Greensboro Batting Center Method
description: Manuscript and companion assets for 'Practice Like a Pro: The Greensboro Batting Center Method' (Justin Goldston, PhD). Focus: standards-based player development, leadership formation, and entrepreneurship lessons from a long-running baseball training culture.
notes: If this repository includes third-party images/logos, ensure permission before release. Zenodo archives releases permanently.
